level.text: A member shall not have a fiduciary duty to an unincorporated nonprofit association or to another member solely by being a member.

A member shall discharge the duties to the unincorporated nonprofit association and the other members and exercise any rights under this chapter consistent with the governing principles and the obligation of good faith and fair dealing.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 29-1123.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on ยง 18 of the Uniform Unincorporated Nonprofit Association Act (2008 Act).
